lead_paragraph: A towel over his head in the waning moments and Kevin Durant's spectacular, statement-making night in the books at last, he could finally breathe and briefly forget the constant chatter about his departure from Oklahoma City.

headline.print_headline: Kevin Durant Scores 39, Dismantles Old Oklahoma City Team
headline.main: Kevin Durant Scores 39, Dismantles Old Oklahoma City Team

snippet: A towel over his head in the waning moments and Kevin Durant's spectacular, statement-making night in the books at last, he could finally breathe and briefly forget the constant chatter about his departure from Oklahoma City....
